biotools.summary: The plugin Fijiyama (Yet Another Matching and Alignment tool for Fiji) is a generic tool for registration and alignment of 3D image series collected from various imaging modalities (MRI, X-rays, Microscopy, Photography, etc.).

bioschemas.name: Fijiyama
bioschemas.summary: The plugin Fijiyama (Yet Another Matching and Alignment tool for Fiji) is a generic tool for registration and alignment of 3D image series collected from various imaging modalities (MRI, X-rays, Microscopy, Photography, etc.).
